content: Eight friends A, B, C, D, E, F, G and H are sitting in a circle facing the centre. B is sitting between G and D. H is third to the left of B and second to the right of A. C is sitting between A and G & B and E are not sitting opposite to each other.
question:
Eight friends A, B, C, D, E, F, G and H are sitting in a circle facing the centre. B is sitting between G and D. H is third to the left of B and second to the right of A. C is sitting between A and G & B and E are not sitting opposite to each other.
Which of the following statement is not correct?
options: D and A are sitting opposite to each other.
C is third to the right of D.
E is sitting between F and D.
A is sitting between C and F.
E and C are sitting opposite to each other.

content: Eight friends A, B, C, D, E, F, G and H are sitting in a circle facing the centre. B is sitting between G and D. H is third to the left of B and second to the right of A. C is sitting between A and G & B and E are not sitting opposite to each other.
question:
Eight friends A, B, C, D, E, F, G and H are sitting in a circle facing the centre. B is sitting between G and D. H is third to the left of B and second to the right of A. C is sitting between A and G & B and E are not sitting opposite to each other.
Who is third to the left of D?
